main.heading: Welcome to OKHaks website
main.description: On this website you'll find some tools for making Oceania game easier.

items.heading: Item information finder
items.description: Enter the name or part of it to find information about some item!

quests.heading: Required quests
quests.description: You need to finish these quests for the item to be available.

rewards.heading: Usage rewards
rewards.description: List of items you get or lose interacting with this tile or using this item. Negative value means that you lose corresponding items after a use. These can be part of building costs and other interactions.

buildItems.heading: Finishing cost
buildItems.description: These items will be spent as part of building completion.

friendRewards.heading: Usage rewards while visiting friends
friendRewards.description: Similarly to usage rewards section these are rewards for interacting with tiles while visiting friends.

quests.heading: Quest information finder
quests.description: Enter the name or part of it to find information about some quest!

rewards.heading: Quest completion rewards
rewards.description: List of items you get or lose after finishing this quest. Negative value means that you lose corresponding items.

req_quests.heading: Required quests
req_quests.description: You need to complete these quests for this quest to be available.

next_quests.heading: Next quests
next_quests.description: These quests will become available after completing this quest.

tasks.heading: Task information finder
tasks.description: Enter the name or part of it to find information about some task!

action.heading: Task's actions
action.description: Table of actions that have to be done to complete this task.

quest.heading: Parent quest
quest.description: This task corresponds to this Quest.

rewards.heading: Task completion rewards
rewards.description: List of items you get or lose after finishing this task. Negative value means that you lose corresponding items.

crafting.heading: Workshop recipe finder
crafting.description: Enter the name or part of it to find information about some workshop recipe!

req_quests.heading: Required quests
req_quests.description: You need to complete these quests for this workshop recipe to be available.

action.heading: Recipe
action.description: List of items you gain or lose by doing this recipe. Negative value means that you lose corresponding items after a use, whilst positive value means you gain this item.
